channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1522; 06:45PM; 6512 N Agnes Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rt5Yjl; #NorthHollywood; Firefighters responded to find a detached garage to the rear of a residential property with heavy fire showing. Flames spread to the home on the adjacent property to the rear, but firefighters quickly extinguished the flames to limit the damage to the exposed home. It took 30 firefighters 20 minutes to fully extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E278 E289 E39 E60 E89 EA1 RA39 RA89 T39 T60 T78 T89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1522; 06:25PM; 6512 N Agnes Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rt5Yjl; #NorthHollywood; Well-involved garage fire to the rear of a single-family home, exposing a neighboring home to flames.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA39 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Grass Fire - Now Out; INC#0763; 12:15PM; NB 5 Fwy x 118 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/37VGQVY; #MissionHills; Firefighters were summoned to reports of a rubbish fire on the side of the Northbound 5 Freeway, near the 118 Freeway interchange. Fire spread to the nearby grass and consumed approximately 1.5 acres. This area is fully contained by the surrounding roads, and there are no structures or personal property threatened. It took 22 firefighters 43 minutes (12:58pm) to locate, establish a water supply to the freeway location, and extinguish the burning dry grass on the shoulder at the interchange. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 CE83 E275 E298 E75 E81 T75 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire - Now Out; INC#1692; 07:31PM; SB 101 Fwy x San Bernardino Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/44opfBb; #BoyleHeights; Eighteen firefighters extinguished flames burning approximately one-half of an acre of light-to-medium brush, in 20 minutes. No structures damaged. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E2 E209 E3; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1027; 02:51PM; 450 E 31st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rrw9qE; #HistoricSouthCentral; A grass fire in a large lot quickly spread to a shed, and then into a one-story single-family home. Fire extended through the entire attic. It took 32 firefighters 49 minutes to extinguish all aspects of this fire. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E10 E14 E15 E210 E215 E46 EA1 RA14 SQ21 T10 T15 T9; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1027; 02:02PM; 3124 S Maple Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JYY33H; #HistoricSouthCentral; Vegetation fire in a vacant lot extended into the attic of a single-family home. Offensive mode.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E14 E15 E215 RA14 SQ21 T15; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0739; 11:52AM; 7317 W Hawthorn Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ob61cC; #Hollywood; The first 24 LAFD firefighters took 18 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames in a two-story L-shaped center hallway apartment building. No one required evacuation, but were encouraged to remain in their units with doors closed to escape the smoke ("shelter-in-place"). Firefighters kept the fire to the unit-of-origin. One patient (elderly female) was evaluated and transported with moderate smoke inhalation. Cause under investigation. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC14 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E108 E203 E220 E227 E229 E261 E29 E3 E41 E61 E68 EM14 HR3 RA61 RA68 RA803 T20 T27 T29 T3 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0739; 11:34AM; 7317 W Hawthorn Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ob61cC; #Hollywood; Fire in one unit of an L-shaped apartment building (center hallway). One patient being assessed by paramedics.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC14 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E108 E203 E220 E227 E229 E261 E29 E3 E41 E61 E68 EM14 HR3 RA61 RA68 RA803 T20 T27 T29 T3 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0540; 09:50AM; 9100 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NL3eW2; #GreenMeadows; The first 12 firefighters quickly deployed hose lines, with the primary objective of keeping the fire contained to the RV and sparing the church. Thankfully, their efforts were successful. Crews protected the nearby structure, and extinguished the flames consuming the RV. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E261 E264 E64 RA264 T61 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0540; 09:41AM; 9100 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NL3eW2; #GreenMeadows; Heavy fire showing from an RV, threatening a nearby church building. Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E261 E264 E64 RA264 T61 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
